Key Match Events: Manuel Neuer lost the ball near the centre circle in the 89th minute, but an offside flag prevented Ukraine from scoring
Pre-Game Insights: Julian Nagelsmann doesn't yet have his full squad available due to several players being involved in the Champions League final
Post-Match Reflections: Julian Nagelsmann has a selection headache with Maximilian Beier impressing on his debut
Kai Havertz's performance was overshadowed by Beier and it's questionable whether he'll be considered a starter by Euro 2024
Miscellaneous Highlights: Germany and Ukraine played a 0-0 draw in the first of two Euro 2024 warm-up friendlies
Germany will play a second warm-up friendly against Greece on June 7 and will open Euro 2024 as hosts against Scotland on June 14
Others: Germany underwhelmed at major international tournaments for the best part of a decade
Maximilian Beier had several great chances to score on his debut, including a strike against the inside of the post
